original_text: Then the fourth angel poured out his bowl on the sun. God gave authority to the sun so that it burned people with fire.
korean_text: 넷째 천사가 그 대접을 해에 쏟으매 해가 권세를 받아 불로 사람들을 태우니

sentences.original_text: Then the fourth angel poured out his bowl on the sun
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 네 번째 천사가 자기 대접을 해 위에 쏟았다

sentences.original_text: God gave authority to the sun
so that it burned people with fire
